name: Takeda Nobuhiro no Super League Soccer
overview: A soccer simulation video game licensed/endorsed by Takeda Nobuhiro and the sequel to Takeda Nobuhiro no Super Cup Soccer. It features club teams based on the top division of Japan Professional Football League J. League Division 1 (though unlicensed) instead of national teams. While it kept largely the same structure of the original game, some new options were added.
